backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, caffeine entries, presets, and settings with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata linking features to frontend files, components, and test requirements for build traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short descriptions summarizing major frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global typography.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing setup with authentication, theming, and page route definitions.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation, footer, and user greeting.
frontend/src/components/app/QueryState.t: Reusable loading, error, and empty-state UI components.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button integrated with React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for entering and saving a user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Gate component that handles login flow, loads user profile, and prompts setup if missing.
frontend/src/components/caffeine/EntryFo: Dialog for adding or editing a caffeine entry, supporting presets and custom input.
frontend/src/components/caffeine/PresetM: UI for creating new caffeine drink presets and listing existing ones.
frontend/src/components/caffeine/TrendCh: Renders a 7‑day bar chart of caffeine totals with limit line indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, profiles, caffeine entries, presets, and settings via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, fonts, and light/dark color palettes for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays daily caffeine stats, hero section, and add-entry dialog using user data and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Computes and presents 7‑day caffeine trends, totals, and averages with charts and summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/LogPage.tsx: Shows a grouped, sortable log of caffeine entries with delete functionality and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows updating daily caffeine limit, managing presets, and viewing general caffeine guidelines.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, feature states, and image requirements for a caffeine‑tracking app.
